node_modules/diacritics-map/README

diacritics-map

Map of more than 1,200 diacritics and ligatures to english alphabet equivalents.

Install

Install with npm:

$ npm install --save diacritics-map

Usage

var diacritics = require('diacritics-map');
console.log(diacritics);
// {
//   ...
//   'À': 'A',
//   'Á': 'A',
//   'Â': 'A',
//   'Ã': 'A',
//   'Ä': 'A',
//   'Å': 'A',
//   'Æ': 'AE',
//   'Ç': 'C',
//   'È': 'E',
//   'É': 'E',
//   'Ê': 'E',
//   'Ë': 'E',
//   'Ì': 'I',
//   'Í': 'I',
//   'Î': 'I',
//   (1,200+ more)...
// }

About

Contributing

Building docs

(This document was generated by verb-generate-readme (a verb generator), please don't edit the readme directly. Any changes to the readme must be made in .verb.md.)

Running tests

Install dev dependencies:

$ npm install -d && npm test
